Richings Tennis

Come join our friendly tennis club!

Welcome to Richings Tennis, a fun local tennis club. We welcome all and regularly have many fun activities, whether it be playing tennis or relaxing in our bar. All in a budget friendly environment.

Become a member

Services

Come and play

Enjoy a friendly club atmosphere that caters for players of all ages and abilities.

Open door to all

Relax in the bar

Immerse yourself in the relaxed atmosphere, while enjoying drinks and/or food.

Kids allowed too

Events

Join us for film/motown/darts/karaoke nights, tournaments, and social tennis. A great opportunity to meet new people as you enjoy playing.

Prices on club board

Coaching

Come and improve your game or celebrate your child's tennis journey with us! We offer fun coaching sessions catered for all.

All are welcome
